Marcelo Wulkan

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4384450766728354
  • Última atualização do currículo em 14/01/2013

Cirurgião plástico membro da Sociedade Brasileira de Cirurgia Plástica. Doutorado pela Faculdade de Medicina da Universidade de São Paulo-FMUSP. Membro da International Confederation for Plastic, Reconstructive and Reconstructive Surgery e da Rhinoplasty Society (active member). (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outras informações relevantes

 
Sobre a aula apresentada pelo Dr. Marcelo Wulkan ( Brazilian Refinements in Reconstructive & Plastic Surgery ): 

 ( ) This talk was outstanding in every manner: in its preparation, organization, content, and delivery. In addition, the talk revealed the depth and maturity of Dr. Wulkan in plastic surgery. This presentation showed outstanding knowledge and understanding of some of the most complex operations in plastic and reconstructive surgery. It also revealed Marcelo´s high ethical standards in how he works with patients and also perceives his own role as a surgeon commited to outstanding care for others.( ).  

Sobre o convívio em Harvard Medical School-Division of Plastic Surgery-Beit Israel Deaconess Medical Center:

 ( ) Marcelo was always motivated, energetic, and cheerful. Dr. Wulkan has many talents and stregths, three of which were particular evident on this rotation. First, is his strong ability to perceive and understand the various techniques and approaches to plastic surgery. Clearly, he´s grounded in this field and, although young of years, he is most mature in his knowledge and approach. Second, Marcelo has excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Third, throughtout his time with us, he was not only a student of plastic surgery but also a teacher. Not only did he learn from us, we also learned from him. ( ) In closing, it was most pleasurable having Dr. Marcelo Wulkan on our service. In all areas, he maximized his opportunities and experience when on our service. We wish him the best of luck. From all that we know about him, he is an outstanding physician/surgeon and we give him our highest recommendation.( )  

Sobre as cirurgias e consultório em Harvard Medical School-Division of Plastic Surgery-Beit Israel Deaconess Medical Center:

 ( ) I am honored that Marcelo chose to spend a great deal of time with me. He was in the operating room all day with us, and then saw our patients with myself and my fellow on our clinic days. Marc
